title: Terra by Battat AN2824Z African Family Miniature Elephant Animal Toys for Kids 3-Years-Old & Up (4 Pc)
features: • Set contains 2 adult Elephants and 2 baby Elephants
description: From the manufacturer Collect them all! Discover the entire Terra by Battat family of toy animal figures! Dreaming of building a miniature zoo animal collection, wildlife refuge, or toy dinosaur set? Terra has everything you need, and you won't have to go all the way to Africa! All you need is imagination! Toy Animals and Dinosaurs! Feature-Packed Animal Houses and Playsets! Cool Electronic Playsets! Wild Animal Tubes! Terra by Battat: African Elephant Family You’re on an assignment photographing wildlife deep in sub-Saharan Africa. Your guide spots something interesting and parks the Land Rover. In the distance, an elephant family relaxes by a river. You know from your research elephants cool off by sucking water into their trunks and showering themselves. You quickly snap some shots, but there’s only a few seconds to ponder these enormous animals before it’s time to leave! Elephant babies are called calves Gestation period: 22 months Elephant calf size: newborn elephants stand up to 3 feet tall and weigh up to 200 pounds Fun fact: of all mammals, elephants have the longest pregnancy...about 22 months! Learn more about these fascinating creatures with Terra by Battat’s animal toys for kids and collectors! Terra by Battat's wildlife collection is more fun than a barrel of monkeys, or a tube of reptiles! Terra animal toys: great accessories for a kids’ birthday party! Are you planning a birthday party? Here's an idea kids will love: make it animal or dinosaur-themed. Yay! Terra's animal toys and dinosaur toys in buckets and tubes are ideal cake toppers and goodie bag stuffers. Then, pick your favourite animal family or dinosaur toy and make it the star of the party! Here’s a few easy Terra-themed suggestions: Jurassic birthday jam, super safari adventure, magical jungle expedition, deep sea submarine, a day at the zoo, barn yard fun! Terra's Safari-Jurassic-Ocean-Farm-Wild Animal Miniature Scavenger Hunt! Before the party, hide some of Terra's fun miniature safari animal toys, dinosaur toys, fish toys, or plastic sea creatures around the house, yard, or party space. Bring the kids together for a meeting and let them know the little animals or dinosaurs have gone missing. Oh no! Then, mention which animals are on the loose. Game on! Whoever finds the lost creature wins the round. Keep playing until all the wayward creatures or dinosaurs have been recovered. Terra animal and dinosaur miniatures: ideal educational toys! Animal toys and dinosaur toys are ideal educational toys for getting kids interested in nature, natural history and science. At Terra by Battat, we know kids love to learn about animals and dinosaurs. And why not? Dinosaurs and animals are a childhood classic. You probably even had a favourite growing up! Our realistic dinosaur toys, playsets, and animal toys encourage creative, open-ended play. They also foster imagination and role playing.
